etymologies: from modern Sanskrit netī ‘ritual drawing of thread through nose and mouth’ (a method of cleansing the nasal cavities practiced in hatha yoga)

definitions: a small container with a long spout used to rinse the nasal cavities (typically with a saline solution) as an alternative therapy for upper respiratory ailments

examples.text: she uses her neti pot at the first sign of the sniffles

shortDefinitions: container with long spout used to rinse nasal cavities
